page.title: 17PRINTER MANAGER 2
page.content: The corrugated board is then is then converted into containers of all sizes and shapes to customers specifications in the conversion departments of the factory.Post printing is crude and resricted to large printing and line drawings.If a customer wanted photographs and fine printing to advertise his goods on a box, before pre-print arrived, sheets of paper had to be printed outside of the factory by specialists in corrugated cardboard .This was very expensive and time consuming.Because pre-printing is on one layer of paper colour photographs and very fine printing can be acheived at a very reasnoble cost, on paper used in the make up of the corrugated board. Daniel Wearmouth.
